messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

access issues people working on integration project please notes sent monday re awaiting your response access issues working integration please notes hi there much since ticket have longer escalated working properly thank you for helping manager sent monday re working integration hello provided below looks like users open using explorer can be problem why cannot access documents also we added visitors groups mean users should be able access sites documents library could you ask users if steel have problems best regards engineer sent wednesday december working integration hi seems like access rights functional integration folders think rd request forwarding you with errors spite access rights folders seems be configured print screen below showing she can access folder but way appears print screen attached she should have rights affecting users integration therefore please treat issue with priority thank you manager
